articles.author: Sean Gallagher
articles.title: Anti-missile test shows US can defend against N. Korean ICBMs, MDA chief says
articles.description: System designed to strike missiles outside the Earth's atmosphere.

articles.author: John Timmer
articles.title: LIGO spots a third black hole merger, tightens mass limits on gravitons
articles.description: The merger also hints about the history of the black holes.

articles.author: Jon Brodkin
articles.title: Verizon reportedly tried to buy #2 cable company Charter, was rejected
articles.description: Charter not ready to sell and $100B Verizon offer was too low, report says.

articles.author: Ron Amadeo
articles.title: Samsung’s “Bixby” assistant still can’t grasp English, is delayed again
articles.description: The Wall Street Journal reports Bixby is "weeks away" from learning English.

articles.author: Peter Bright
articles.title: Skype goes all Snapchat with Highlights, its own riff on Stories
articles.description: Microsoft’s messaging app follows in footsteps of Instagram and Facebook Messenger.

articles.author: Jonathan M. Gitlin
articles.title: Uber lost another $708 million in the first three months of the year
articles.description: Chief Financial Officer Gautam Gupta is also leaving the company.

articles.author: Diana Gitig
articles.title: This one weird antibody to reduce belly fat (in post-menopausal women)
articles.description: In mice, it induces fat cells to burn more energy instead of storing it.

articles.author: Jonathan M. Gitlin
articles.title: The 2017 Jaguar F-Pace marries sport and utility
articles.description: Fun to drive, carries plenty of cargo, but let down by a punishing low-speed ride.

articles.author: Valentina Palladino
articles.title: Apple’s Siri-controlled smart speaker could be revealed at WWDC next week
articles.description: But you'll probably have to wait until late 2017 to get your hands on it.

articles.author: Valentina Palladino
articles.title: Got an antenna and a tuner? You can now stream live TV with Plex
articles.description: Free broadcasts now live where you watch the rest of your streamed content.
